ok… hmm u have a dell inspiron b130? and if so could you tell me exactly how you got it to work? i wanna switch to linux but i am not going without internet, and i tried it all, could not get it to work

Go to this link, I KNOW IT IS FOR DELL INSPIRON 1501(my laptop) but the wifi cards SHOULD be the same!

item.title: Whats better windows xp or linux
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Hiaburi, post:27, topic:81645”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=120032.msg1182414#msg1182414 date=1177029035]

linux way better, much faster, if you use broadcom wifi card, then windows is better… i would be on linux if it wasnt for my wifi card…

Broadcom wifi cards work with linux, I have one in my laptop, all you need is ndiswrapper.
[/quote]
i tried that, my card would not turn on while on linux, the wifi light on my laptop was off and even the fn(f2) thing wouldnt turn it on…[/quote]

Even if the light doesn’t come on it is still on. My laptop is the same way.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats better windows xp or linux
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:14, topic:81645”]I don’t like Linux, and find myself missing xp even though i have vista. Mac looks good.

Why i don’t like linux?

  • I’m lazy and cbf typing things into console when i can click.
  • Wine sucks.
  • Cedega sucks.
  • Gnome is just ugly.
  • Killed my windows partition.[/quote]
  • Shortcuts & scripts
  • Don’t use windows only programs, or use a free alternative
  • Don’t support game developer\publishers who are too lazy to make a version for Linux
  • Try skins or KDE
  • PEBKAC

Read full topic
item.source: Whats better windows xp or linux

item.title: Whats better windows xp or linux
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Really, I think it depends on what you want. Windows is more end user oriented. Linux is more administrator oriented. Each is better than the other in that field.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

You can order Ubuntu cd’s here free of charge, they’ll send you an live cd + the real installation one. I ordered and it took them about… a month and they sent me 3 cd’s. Live CD FTW!
https://shipit.ubuntu.com/

Read full topic

item.source: Whats better windows xp or linux

item.title: Whats better windows xp or linux
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

- I'm lazy and cbf typing things into console when i can click.
Err.... console is so powerful that it overwhelms my tendency to be lazy :P
- Wine sucks.
1) Wine doesn't suck, you do. I've tried Wine on tons of programs, and they all work [u]perfectly[/u] (aslong as you import your Windows fonts) 2) Don't use Wine. There are PLENTY of native Linux programs.
- Cedega sucks.
1) Cedega doesn't suck. Cedega is mainly used for 3D games, like CS. 2) ""
- Gnome is just ugly.
I agree. Get KDE.
- Killed my windows partition.
If I remember, I responded to that post in the Linux section. You rushed through the Ubuntu installer, and the default option on one of the steps is to reformat.
fellixombc:

linux dosent have much software.

Uhh, lol? Linux has tons and tons and tons of software, and even many different options for what you want.

Read full topic

linux for server/laptop
